content.rendered: A sport with one of the most devoted fan-followings in the world, baseball has a few moments that every fan of this “national pastime” should experience once in their lives. Whether it is witnessing the dazzling skills of baseball’s biggest stars at the Home Run Derby and All-Star Game, or seeing the most thrilling moments of the World Series live, you can witness some of baseball history with Roadtrips’ custom baseball travel packages.
